thread.title: BRIEF-Firstrand Ltd Says ‍Johan Burger Will Retire As Group And Bank CEO

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Firstrand Ltd Says ‍Johan Burger Will Retire As Group And Bank CEO

organizations.name: brief-firstrand ltd says ‍johan burger will retire as group and bank

text:
Feb 27 (Reuters) - Firstrand Ltd:
* JOHAN BURGER WILL RETIRE AS GROUP AND BANK CEO, EFFECTIVE 31 MARCH 2018​
* ‍ALAN PULLINGER, CURRENTLY GROUP DEPUTY CEO, IS APPOINTED GROUP AND BANK CEO, EFFECTIVE 1 APRIL 2018​
* ‍MARY VILAKAZI, PREVIOUSLY DEPUTY CEO OF MMI HOLDINGS LIMITED (MMI), IS APPOINTED GROUP AND BANK COO AND EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, EFFECTIVE 1 JULY ​
* ‍BURGER WILL TRANSITION TO A NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR ON 1 SEPTEMBER 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
